items.title: Afternoon guided city tour of Agra
items.summary: Agra has much to offer besides the Taj Mahal, such as Agra Fort, a masterpiece of design and construction.

items.title: Day trip from Delhi to Agra by Gatimaan Express train
items.summary: You travel from Delhi to Agra by the Gatimaan Express, which covers the 200km distance in less than 2 hours.

items.title: Early morning guided visit to the Taj
items.summary: The best time of day to appreciate this stunning monument is as soon as the Taj Mahal opens, when it is at its quietest and most serene.

items.title: Early morning visit to the Taj Mahal (without guide)
items.summary: The best time of day to appreciate this stunning monument is as soon as the Taj Mahal opens, when it is at its quietest and most serene.

items.title: Half day city tour of Agra
items.summary: The Taj Mahal is one of the most fascinating and beautiful monuments in the world. About 20,000 workers were employed in its construction, which took some 20 years.

items.title: Half-day excursion to Fatehpur Sikri
items.summary: An hour outside Agra is the deserted Mughal city of Fatehpur Sikri, a complex of sandstone forts, palaces and mosques.
